page.title: 06INDUSTRY ON ASTON MOOR (2)
page.content: {CUMBRIA ENGINEERING Cumbria Engineering Ltd. is housed in the former Alston Foundry building. {Mechanical handling plant}for the{ {Metal and Mineral processing {industries}is produced. The firm services several mineral industries in the area but the majority of its customers are further afield. A recent project was the steel work at the entrance to the new Lanes shopping centre in Carlisle. The work force includes both Alston people and some workmen from outside with special skills . {ALSTON PLASTICS} Alston Plastics is one of the newer industries. Beginning in 1985,it employs 4; there are plans for expansion.The major product is{shop {fronts}and their customers are from outside Alston.
